name: Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
description: This fully revised second edition of the Encyclopedia of Latin American History & Culture greatly enhances the scope and depth of this comprehensive resource. Each of the 5,800+ entries was reviewed for currency and content. It also includes Spanish and Portuguese-language sources as well as many more Latin American contributors, many of whom wrote their initial entries in their respective languages. This revised edition was edited by Jay Kinsbruner, Erik Langer and a team of consultants from three continents and was compiled by an international group of expert contributors.
